name: Stone Of Ressurection
description:
Hello fellas my name is EnchikO and i would like to introduce my game. The game is not a Demo :)

Game has 2 Languages (Czech and English).

This game has a 2 endings and they depends on your choice :).

Please do not skip a story coz this game is about the story not about a gameplay like WOW etc. :D when u just pick up a Quest and rush it. 

Its simple game and take you like 20 minute to finish.

More info in RAR file :). Feel free to ask me.

youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbz7uPqUdn20Y4uPsTS6Gaw
